info.title: time@work rest api
info.description: internal rest api, used by time@work angular client

tags.name: ui-admin
tags.description: ui: admin and team lead api calls

post.summary: login with username and password, getting an jwt token on successful.

get.summary: retrieving all visible projects for current user.
retrieving a specific visible projects for current user.
retrieving tasks for a specific project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: project id to find tasks for

post.summary: create a new task for an existing project

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: project id for task to change

403.description: not authorized as project lead or admin

get.summary: retrieving team member assignments for a specific task.

post.summary: add a new assignment to an existing task.

delete.summary: delete an existing assignment from task

get.summary: retrieving work week for given week, date format: /rest/workweek/YYYY-MM-DD.

parameters.name: from-iso-date-string
parameters.description: date, start of week, format YYYY-MM-DD

put.summary: update work done for given week

parameters.name: from-iso-date-string
parameters.description: date, start of week, format YYYY-MM-DD

active.description: is project active for administration by project lead.

Task.description: a project task to be worked on.

TeamMember.description: a team member, could be project lead or an member with assigned tasks.

TaskWeek.description: one week of working hours for a given task.

workHours.description: working hours done for given task on this day

readOnly.description: current user is able to  change values for this day and task.

taskWeeks.description: list of tasks for this week

WorkWeek.description: week, holds all work and working assignments.

Authentication.description: auth with jwt bearer token in 'Authentication' header of proctected requests.
Authentication.name: Authentication
